name: 陸一平
objective:
本課程旨在全面介紹人工智慧（AI）的基礎知識與最新技術發展，涵蓋資料科學、機器學習、深度學習、自監督學習與自然語言處理等核心主題。學生將從 AI 的歷史與概念入門，逐步探索各種學習模型的理論基礎與實務應用，進而理解如注意力機制、生成對抗網絡（GAN）、大型語言模型（如 GPT）等前沿技術。
課程強調「理論與實作並重」，每週安排主題式教學，搭配實務操作與小組討論，以培養學生的問題解決能力、跨領域整合能力與實作經驗。學員將有機會使用如 Python 實作各類 AI 應用，並於課程末完成一項小組專題。
This course offers a comprehensive overview of the foundations and cutting-edge developments in Artificial Intelligence (AI), covering core topics such as data science, machine learning, deep learning, self-supervised learning, and natural language processing. Students will begin by learning the history and core concepts of AI, then progressively explore theoretical foundations and practical applications of various learning models, including advanced techniques such as attention mechanisms, generative adversarial networks (GANs), and large-scale language models like GPT.
Designed with a strong balance of theory and hands-on practice, the course features weekly thematic modules combining lectures, coding exercises, and collaborative discussions. Students will gain essential skills in using tools like Python to develop real-world AI applications, culminating in a final group project.
schedule:
第 1 週：人工智慧導論與歷史發展
Week 1: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Historical Background

第 2 週：資料科學與資料前處理
Week 2: Data Science and Preprocessing

第 3 週：特徵工程與資料可視化
Week 3: Feature Engineering and Data Visualization

第 4 週：監督式學習基礎
Week 4: Fundamentals of Supervised Learning

第 5 週：非監督式學習與群集分析
Week 5: Unsupervised Learning and Clustering Analysis

第 6 週：模型評估與交叉驗證
Week 6: Model Evaluation and Cross-Validation

第 7 週：深度學習基礎與多層感知器
Week 7: Deep Learning Foundations and Multilayer Perceptrons (MLPs)

第 8 週：卷積神經網路（CNN）
Week 8: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)

第 9 週：循環神經網路與長短期記憶（RNN & LSTM）
Week 9: Recurrent Neural Networks and LSTM

第 10 週：自然語言處理與語意表示
Week 10: Natural Language Processing and Semantic Representations

第 11 週：生成對抗網絡（GAN）原理與應用
Week 11: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) – Principles and Applications

第 12 週：注意力機制與 Transformer 架構
Week 12: Attention Mechanisms and Transformer Architecture

第 13 週：自監督學習理論與方法
Week 13: Self-Supervised Learning – Theory and Methods

第 14 週：大型語言模型與多模態系統
Week 14: Large Language Models and Multimodal AI Systems

第 15 週：元學習與自適應人工智慧
Week 15: Meta-Learning and Adaptive AI

第 16 週：AI 前沿挑戰與課堂專題發表
Week 16: Frontier Challenges in AI and Final Project Presentations

第 17 週：期末報告
Week 17: Final Report

第 18 週：期末報告
Week 18: Final Report
